Key Features:-  Battery saver: Save power and extend your smartphoneâs battery life with âONE CLICK OPTIMIZEâ-  Browse faster: Improve your browsing speed by ending unnecessary background apps.-  Security manager: Protect your browsing security, by getting a warning when on a website with untrusted WOT ratings. reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: It does a pretty good job of extending battery life by adjusting the display settings, but it has you much latency in clearing out the RAM to get 5 stars from me. Most of the time clearing the RAM doesn\'t free more than 10% of the 75% that\'s consumed.
reviews.author: Rene Stephenson

reviews.title: WoW
reviews.comment: Before this app i use juice defender that i paid version.Its a good app but this is the best. Removes all the guess work. This works way better than juice defender that i no longer use thanks to this app. Love it.
reviews.author: Sam Wright

reviews.title: This app cost me 10$.
reviews.comment: This app, turned On the option to turn Off WiFi whenever I turned my screen off. And guess what, that day I updated my Navigation maps (4Gb). And because of that option I have exceeded my data limit by 3Gb! That will cost me ~10$! This app is sneaky, it doesn\'t tell how or what it does to save battery. Just avoid it, so you won\'t have sad experience as I did.
reviews.author: Andrej Tiurin

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Simple, efficient,  convenient. A must have for any phone it makes older phones functional and offers great improvements in battery life. It\'s available in your drop down menu, and you\'re able to adjust your battery usage while you surfing the web.
reviews.author: Jonathan Revis

reviews.title: Everything fine aft i found out..
reviews.comment: This browser is excellent! Its just that after downloading this app and going safe websites, is that i found out my phone started to have random restarts. I dont know what is happening, but there is nothing different after the restart. Is there anyhing wrng?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not configurable
reviews.comment: No matter how I alter the settings, it won\'t refresh my gmail in the background. It just shuts down background services without discretion. I don\'t even notice a battery life difference compared to using a task manager. Skip it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect. Pantech Xover
reviews.comment: This works perfectly on my phone. The browser (HD) is needed for this but that\'s fine its worth it either way. Not only dose it save your batterey it charges it fast just now my batterey was at like 40% after a good 15 or less (I think minutes) its already at 99-100%. Its great I reccomend it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WOT should be a separate add-on
reviews.comment: Notifications annoying... WOT is the main reason I installed. WOT should be a separate add-on all by it\'s self. May be uninstalling soon.
reviews.author: Micah Hawcroft

reviews.title: \"Awesome\" - Really
reviews.comment: There aren\'t enough words to tell how the new update of this app took it to another level. Kudos..
reviews.author: Mary McCraven

reviews.title: %100 WASTE-GARBAGE-CRAP!!!
reviews.comment: I thought this would be a good add on but it does the total opposite & sucks the BATTERY DRY !!! The browser is good, this here is fools gold!  #PeaceNotBeef
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work.
reviews.comment: Ideas to make it better:  -Customize individual options below each battery profile -Option to turn off the notification!
reviews.author: Chris Prichard

reviews.title: Look Elsewhere
reviews.comment: This will adjust some other settings too, but it is basically an app killer, which has been pointless since Gingerbread. Apps in the background shouldn\'t use resources, and attempting to kill them just causes them to start again, using MORE battery, not saving battery.   This is snake oil, and the fact that Dolphin pushes it makes me lose respect for them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent and super simple
reviews.comment: Been using from day-3 of this phone purchase (almost 1 year now). Definitely helped to increase the battery significantly. The option is simple to use; great for someone clueless like me.
reviews.author: Makiko S

reviews.title: Killer task killer
reviews.comment: I haven\'t felt if the battery saver is significant or not, but the task killer is amazing. Is better than my preloaded galaxy S4 task killer and can free even more space
reviews.author: Randy Adiwiguna

reviews.title: Not configurable
reviews.comment: Nice idea, but too prescriptive. All modes force my phone to silent (non-vibrate). This is useless to me. Need to have some configurations for user preferences.
reviews.author: Faris Jessa

reviews.title: poor
reviews.comment: gives notifications and when i open it, it says no notifications? also inaccurate on the time left on battery uninstalling.
reviews.author: Letitia Chow

reviews.title: Not useful
reviews.comment: Would constantly turn on my WiFi when I shut off the screen.   Since installation dolphin browser now force closes and will require a fresh insall.   Unable to alter each power profile.  Much better to alter settings manually when power saving is needed or use GSam power app.
reviews.author: Christopher Willis

reviews.title: IT TOTALLY DESTROYED MY DEVICE!!!!!
reviews.comment: IT TOTALLY DESTROYED MY DEVICE, AFTER INSTALLING AND ENABLING IT, MY DEVICE WENT BLACK THEN AFTER THAT, IT CANT BOOT PAST THE ANDROID LOGO.. -_- NICE WORK F-U-C-K-E-R-S!!!! NEXT TIME PLACE SOMTHING THAT WOULD WARN USERS OF YOUR F-U-C-K-I-N-G WORK!!!!!! IT TOTALLY SPEED UP THE PROCESS OF DESTROYING AN ANDROID DEVICE..   EVERYBODY DOWNLOAD THIS S-H-I-T IF YOU WANT TO SPEED UP THE DESTRUCTION OF YOUR DEVICE!!! HAPPY BROWSING !!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad app
reviews.comment: The memory low pop up is very annoying. The battery saver and memory booster should have been two apps.
reviews.author: Sumeet Jain

reviews.title: Boo
reviews.comment: Dislike how dolphin pushes certain add ons, I don\'t want to be told which to install. Can\'t easily disable, annoying icon. Weak customization compared to other battery saving apps
reviews.author: A Google User
